name: Pixel Tamers
description:
Start your wonderful journey in the fairy world, collect amazing buddies with multiple gameplay!

【Idle---Offline Bonus】

Go idle with battle, get rich rewards for even going offline, increase your power easily!

【Awaken---Z power】

Awaken your fairy, upgrade appearance and learn fancy new skills!

【Fight for honor --- Gym challenge】

Fight different trainers in Gym all over the map, time to display true skills!
